summary: Iteration 15 - FINAL FUNCTION VERIFICATION: All 19 features tested and verified. Backend: 25/25 tests passed (100%). Frontend UI: All critical user flows working correctly.

USER_flows.login: PASS - user@test.com / 123456 login works, redirects to homepage with 'Hello, Test' shown
USER_flows.browse_products: PASS - 32 products displayed with categories filter, price range filter
USER_flows.add_to_cart: PASS - 'Add to Cart' button works, toast notification 'Shea Butter (Raw) added to cart!'
USER_flows.view_cart: PASS - Cart shows items, Order Summary with Subtotal (£13.96), Delivery (£6.99), Total (£20.95)
USER_flows.remove_from_cart: PASS - Remove button visible and functional
USER_flows.forgot_password: PASS - Full flow: email input -> 'Check Your Email' success page -> 'Password reset instructions sent!' toast
USER_flows.profile_page: PASS - GET /profile endpoint returns user data

OWNER_flows.dashboard_loads: PASS - Full Owner Dashboard with 9 tabs: Overview, Vendors, Products, Orders, Advertisements, Analytics, Finance, Deliveries, Customers
OWNER_flows.dashboard_stats: PASS - Total Revenue: £54.97, Total Orders: 1, Commission: £5.497, Active Vendors: 6, Total Products: 32
OWNER_flows.view_vendors: PASS - GET /owner/vendors returns vendor list with 1 pending approval

CHATBOT_flows.welcome_message: PASS - AfroBot opens with welcome message and quick reply buttons
CHATBOT_flows.chat_interaction: PASS - POST /chatbot/message endpoint returns AI response

DELIVERY_flows.calculate_delivery: PASS - POST /delivery/calculate returns delivery_cost for London postcode
DELIVERY_flows.get_options: PASS - GET /delivery/options returns available delivery options

context_for_next_testing_agent: All 19 features verified working. Backend APIs 100% functional. Cart operations (add, update, remove, clear) all working. Owner Dashboard loads with full stats. AfroBot chatbot responds with AI-generated messages. Delivery calculation working for UK postcodes. No mocked APIs - all real integrations.

mocked_apis.note: NO MOCKED APIs - All features fully implemented with Firebase/Firestore backend and OpenAI chatbot integration

ui_verified_screenshots: Homepage with hero banner, categories, chatbot button
Products page with 32 products, filters, Add to Cart buttons
Cart page with Order Summary, quantity controls, checkout button
Forgot Password page and success state 'Check Your Email'
Owner Dashboard with 9 tabs and full stats display
AfroBot chatbot with welcome message and quick replies
